answers.answer: I am sorry but I do not recommend weight loss pills due to medical side effects. That is great you are going to the gym 3-5 times a week. Muscle weights more then fat. Do not use the weight scale because as you build lean body muscle mass it will not show you are losing weight. Use a measuring tape and measure your bust, waist, and hips for trimmer waist and hips. Your clothes are a great indication that your getting trimmer and not the scale.
